prayers.section_description: Basic prayers used in the introductory rites of the Mass

prayers.title: Signum Crucis
prayers.latin: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
prayers.english: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

prayers.title: Dominus Vobiscum
prayers.latin: Dominus vobiscum.
prayers.english: The Lord be with you.

prayers.title: Et Cum Spiritu Tuo
prayers.latin: Et cum spiritu tuo.
prayers.english: And with your spirit.

prayers.section_description: Prayers and responses used during the Penitential Rite

prayers.title: Confiteor
prayers.latin: Confiteor Deo omnipotenti, beatae Mariae semper Virgini, ... Amen.
prayers.english: I confess to Almighty God, to Blessed Mary ever Virgin, ... Amen.

prayers.title: Penitential Act (Form B)
prayers.latin: V/. Miserere nostri, Domine. R/. Quia peccavimus tibi. V/. Ostende nobis, Domine, misericordiam tuam. R/. Et salutare tuum da nobis.
prayers.english: V/. Have mercy on us, O Lord. R/. For we have sinned against you. V/. Show us, O Lord, your mercy. R/. And grant us your salvation.

prayers.title: Penitential Act (Form C)
prayers.latin: V/. Qui missus es sanare contritos corde: Kyrie, eleison. R/. Kyrie, eleison. ...
prayers.english: V/. You were sent to heal the contrite of heart: Lord, have mercy. R/. Lord, have mercy. ...

prayers.title: Kyrie Eleison
prayers.latin: Kyrie eleison. Christe eleison. Kyrie eleison.
prayers.english: Lord, have mercy. Christ, have mercy. Lord, have mercy.

prayers.title: Gloria in Excelsis
prayers.title_english: Glory to God in the Highest
prayers.latin: Gloria in excelsis Deo et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis. ... Amen.
prayers.english: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace to people of good will. ... Amen.

prayers.section_description: Profession of faith prayers used during Mass

prayers.title: Credo (Apostles' Creed)
prayers.latin: Credo in Deum, Patrem omnipotentem, Creatorem caeli et terrae. ... Amen.
prayers.english: I believe in God, the Father Almighty, Creator of heaven and earth. ... Amen.

prayers.title: Nicene Creed
prayers.latin: Credo in unum Deum, Patrem omnipotentem, factorem caeli et terrae, ... Amen.
prayers.english: I believe in one God, the Father almighty, maker of heaven and earth, ... Amen.

prayers.section_description: Dialogues and acclamations used during the Liturgy of the Eucharist

prayers.title: Orate Fratres
prayers.latin: Orate, fratres, ut meum ac vestrum sacrificium acceptabile fiat apud Deum Patrem omnipotentem.
prayers.english: Pray, brethren, that my sacrifice and yours may be acceptable to God, the almighty Father.

prayers.title: Preface Dialogue
prayers.latin:
Dominus vobiscum.
Et cum spiritu tuo.
Sursum corda.
Habemus ad Dominum.
Gratias agamus Domino Deo nostro.
Dignum et iustum est.
prayers.english:
The Lord be with you.
And with your spirit.
Lift up your hearts.
We lift them up to the Lord.
Let us give thanks to the Lord our God.
It is right and just.

prayers.title: Sanctus
prayers.latin: Sanctus, Sanctus, Sanctus Dominus Deus Sabaoth. Pleni sunt caeli et terra gloria tua. Hosanna in excelsis. Benedictus qui venit in nomine Domini. Hosanna in excelsis.
prayers.english: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

prayers.title: Mystery of Faith I
prayers.latin: Mortem tuam annuntiamus, Domine, et tuam resurrectionem confitemur, donec venias.
prayers.english: We proclaim your Death, O Lord, and profess your Resurrection until you come again.

prayers.title: Mystery of Faith II
prayers.latin: Quotiescumque manducamus panem hunc et calicem bibimus, mortem tuam annuntiamus, Domine, donec venias.
prayers.english: When we eat this Bread and drink this Cup, we proclaim your Death, O Lord, until you come again.

prayers.title: Mystery of Faith III
prayers.title_english: Save Us, Savior of the World
prayers.latin: Salvator mundi, salva nos, qui per crucem et resurrectionem tuam liberasti nos.
prayers.english: Save us, Savior of the world, for by your Cross and Resurrection you have set us free.

prayers.title: Pax Domini
prayers.latin: Pax Domini sit semper vobiscum.
prayers.english: The peace of the Lord be with you always.

prayers.title: Agnus Dei
prayers.latin: Agnus Dei, qui tollis peccata mundi, miserere nobis. ... dona nobis pacem.
prayers.english: Lamb of God, you take away the sins of the world, have mercy on us. ... grant us peace.

prayers.title: Ecce Agnus Dei
prayers.latin: Ecce Agnus Dei, ecce qui tollit peccata mundi. Beati qui ad cenam Agni vocati sunt.
prayers.english: Behold the Lamb of God, behold him who takes away the sins of the world. Blessed are those called to the supper of the Lamb.

prayers.title: Domine, Non Sum Dignus
prayers.latin: Domine, non sum dignus ut intres sub tectum meum, sed tantum dic verbo et sanabitur anima mea.
prayers.english: Lord, I am not worthy that you should enter under my roof, but only say the word and my soul shall be healed.

prayers.section_description: Prayers and responses used during the conclusion of Mass

prayers.title: Ite, Missa Est
prayers.latin: Ite, missa est.
prayers.english: Go forth, the Mass is ended.

prayers.title: Actus Fidei
prayers.latin: Domine Deus, credo omnia quae Ecclesia Catholica infallibiliter proponit... Amen.
prayers.english: O my God, I firmly believe all the truths the Holy Catholic Church teaches... Amen.

prayers.title: Actus Spei
prayers.latin: Domine Deus, spero per misericordiam tuam... Amen.
prayers.english: O my God, relying on Your mercy and promises... Amen.

prayers.title: Actus Caritatis
prayers.latin: Domine Deus, amo Te super omnia... Amen.
prayers.english: O my God, I love You above all things... Amen.

prayers.title: Oblatio Matutina
prayers.latin: O Iesu, per Immaculatum Cor Mariae, offero Tibi preces... Amen.
prayers.english: O Jesus, through the Immaculate Heart of Mary, I offer You my prayers... Amen.

prayers.title: Communio Spiritualis
prayers.latin: Iesu mi, credo Te in Sanctissimo Sacramento vere praesentem... Amen.
prayers.english: My Jesus, I believe that You are present in the Most Holy Sacrament... Amen.

prayers.title: Laudes Divinae
prayers.latin: Benedictus Deus. Benedictum Nomen Sanctum eius. ... Amen.
prayers.english: Blessed be God. Blessed be His Holy Name. ... Amen.
